rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
No high-potency verbs, metaphors, superlatives, or critical alert phrases.
Contains reassuring/safety cue, not Q3 pattern.
Segment does not contain a question.
This segment reports proper cooking kills viruses, a preparedness cue lacking a public safety link.
The segment contains a reassuring fact but not a minimiser + scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes cooking poultry/eggs kills viruses ('Properly cooking poultry and eggs... will also kill any viruses'), a safeguard/recommendation, without linking to calm/safety.
